message:
Una de mis favoritos: When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be
infinitely easier on you - Zig Ziglar
En Ingles: http://tweetburst.com/  (Compartir tuyos!)
Build it and they will come?
Esta me gusta mucho: If you work on stuff that you like & feel passionate about, you don't need a master plan with how things will play out. - Mark Zuckerberg
If you don't stand for something, you will fall for anything - Sucker Punch :P
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts - Churchill
"A good plan, violently executed now, is better than a perfect plan next week." - George Patton
"Expect the unexpected, and whenever possible, be the unexpected"
"starting is easy, finishing is hard" Jason Calacanis
Better achieve 65% of the impossible, than 100% of the possible. Don Dodge.
"Just build something that you’d want to use today, not something you think people could use somehow". Paul Graham.
"You don’t need a business plan. You don’t need to have an MBA. All you need is a great idea. Anything is possible and you can accomplish it." Ron Conway
"You have to pay attention to money, but it shouldn’t be about the money." Tim O’Reilly
What do Microsoft’s Bill Gates, Apple’s Steve Jobs, Facebook’s Mark Zuckerberg, and Virgin’s Richard Branson have in common? - They all dropped out of school.
@Krator también Hitler es un desertor escolar.
(Amanecí un poco ácido, ergo mi Reductio ad Hitlerum.)
También los limpiavidrios de crucero desertaron de la escuela :)
yo tambien me salía de la escuela y me iba a "las maquinitas"
Yo me iba tambien a "las maquinitas" pero despues de la escuela haha. De cualquier manera, no confundamos correlacion con causa.
Yo no iba a la universidad porque prefería aprovechar mi tiempo en aprender :).
@nRikeDiaz "Never let schooling get in the way of your education." dice Mark Twain :)
Por quedarme a aprender por mi cuenta , estoy en aprietos en la scuela
